channel.title: Please Help!
channel.description: Hey guys, I have port forwarded and everything is set up with client source cache etc... I just need to get it online .. It tells me the server is online yet when i log on it says error connecting to server on my webclient. If anyone could help out would be much appreciated. -Sandon

item.title: Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

#1 when u check to see if its portforwarded make sure you have source running.
#2 once thats done make sure u change the server ip from 127.0.0.1 to your no-ip…example:hostgushersisawesome.no-ip.biz
#3 once thats done u are ready to go

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

make sure your client is connecting to the proper ip and port

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help!

item.description:

Hey guys,
I have port forwarded and everything is set up with client source cache etc… I just need to get it online … It tells me the server is online yet when i log on it says error connecting to server on my webclient.
If anyone could help out would be much appreciated.
